verses.verse: And the men<WH582> of Kiriath-jearim<WH7157> came<WH935>, and fetched up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and brought<WH935> it into the house<WH1004> of Abinadab<WH41> in the hill<WH1389>, and sanctified<WH6942> Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> to keep<WH8104> the ark<WH727> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
